name: The Dancing Hotdog
description:
Heard of the Dancing Hotdog? Well now you can play the game! With only the finest gameplay, top-notch graphics, and incredible background music, this game will have you playing for hours!

Here's how to play:
- Tap the ketchup bottle to shoot ketchup at a hotdog
- Tap the mustard bottle to shoot mustard at a hotdog
- Get a hotdog with both ketchup & mustard to earn a point
- Try to get as many points as you can

(Disclaimer: The characters illustrated in this game are unique characters owned by us and have no affiliation with Snapchat.)
